name: Pink
description:
*This game was made in 48 hours during Global Game Jam 2018

Description

It's all about Pink.

Controls

Move: Arrowkeys

Jump: Up arrow or Space

Restart: Down arrow (When you are out of jumps)

Credits

Programming and Art: Kumu

Music: SOFT RAIN -Glass Boy (non-commercial usage from freemusicarchive.org)

Developer Note

This game contains major bugs which will be fixed soon
